column3: Oh, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! I was not expecting you to return so soon. Is...is something wrong?
Tell him you wish to abandon your work on the anima?
Of course, how silly of me! Though, for a moment, I was all but certain you wished to...to...
Ahem. But should the time come that you decide you can no longer continue, I would understand.
You need say no more. Far be it from me to deny you a well-earned respite. If and when you are willing to resume our research, I shall be here, ready and waiting.
Very well, then I shall take the anima glass for safekeeping.
If and when you are willing to resume our research, I shall be here, ready and waiting.
Should you choose to abandon the quest “Born Again Anima,” the aetheric condensation of your anima weapon will be reset.
Moreover, your progress will not be restored in the event you decide to undertake this quest again with the same job.
Please be advised that this process cannot be reversed.
Are you certain you wish to abandon the quest “Born Again Anima” and reset your progress?
You may speak with Ardashir at any time should you decide to abandon this quest in the future.
You may speak with Ardashir at any time should you decide to undertake this quest in the future.
